name: MALU XD
description: Powerful WhatsApp bot made by Malvin King

OWNER_NUM.description: Your WhatsApp number including country code (e.g., 263XXXXXXXX).

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Set to true to enable auto-read of WhatsApp statuses.

AUTO_REACT_STATUS.description: Set to true to enable auto-reaction to statuses.

AUTO_STATUS_LIKE.description: Set to true to enable auto-like for statuses (if supported).

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Set to true to show recording presence when typing.

Mode.description: Set bot mode: public / private / groups / inbox
